tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE royalty_payments (
    payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_id UUID,
    record_label_id UUID,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    payment_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE artist (artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (artist_id))

CREATE TABLE record_label (label_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  label_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
  PRIMARY KEY (label_id))

CREATE TABLE royalty_payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_id INT NOT NULL,
  label_id INT NOT NULL,
  payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  payment_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES artist(artist_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (label_id) REFERENCES record_label(label_id))

CREATE TABLE artist (artist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name STRING,
  genre STRING,
  birth_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE record_label (label_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name STRING,
  foundation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE song (song_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title STRING,
  release_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE revenue_sharing (sharing_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_id UUID,
  label_id UUID,
  song_id UUID,
  revenue DECIMAL,
  share_percentage DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE albums (
    album_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    album_title STRING,
    release_date DATE,
    record_label_id INT,
    artist_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE royalty_payments (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    payment_date DATE,
    total_payment DECIMAL,
    record_label_id INT,
    artist_id INT
);
